
# Function


## ```js debug ```


This function is a simple wrapper around the SLog class that let you use the debug features quickly

## Parameters

- **message**  Mixed: The message to log



## Example (js)

```js
import debug from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/log/debug';
debug('Hello world');
```
